title: Use It, Don't Abuse It: A Spiritiual Memoir
description: How does a young girl growing up without a stable family or a solidfoundation of loving support find her way in the world? How does she enter adulthood able to navigate her way into the future of her dreams when she has nothing in her own life experience to point the way? And, in one pivotal moment, when she is given a chance to prove herself, does she risk everything and take a chance?In Use It, Donâ€™t Abuse It, the author takes us on a journey through the loneliness and frustration of dealing with family alcoholism and disordered eating. And shows exceptional courage and faith as she learns to overcome obstacles few people ever have to face. All along the way, the still, small voice of the Holy Spirit is whispering in her ear, and her guardian angel is lighting the way.
author: Cheryl Glaiser
